climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【STOP! THE NECK PAIN & SLEEPLESS NIGHTS ARE OVER!】After years of discomfort, you've found salvation at last! Meet the game-changer in the pillow industry, all-new ergonomic pillow with US patent – Osteo! The unique design of the hollow center is what sets it apart! The special hollow center cradles the head, helps maintain the natural cervical curve and alignment of the vertebrae in your neck, aims to maintain good blood flow to your neck and head, relieve pressure and remove muscles tension.

【THE BEST INVESTMENT OF YOUR REST & HEALTH!】 Did you toss and turn all night? Did you wake up with neck cramps or back soreness? The wrong pillow may worsen headaches, neck pain, shoulder and arm numbness, notes surgeon Andrew Hecht, MD. Osteo neck pillow provides all of the curves, divots and angles needed to help to relieve pressure which has a more refined thoughtful contour design than others, fits side, back, and stomach sleepers. Choose us, choose better sleep and a healthier future!

【HOT SLEEPERS & ALLERGY SUFFERERS, REJOICE!】Osteo neck support pillow uses 3D mesh fiber pillowcase that allows heat to escape and fresh air to cycle in. You can rest assured that you will own a cooling and sweet dream! If you're sensitive to smell and want a natural and odorless pillow, Ostoe sutera pillow is the answer! We didn't take any shortcuts on the quality of our materials. All of our memory foam pillows are CertiPUR-US certified and Oeko-Tex approved, without any harmful substance!

【ADJUSTABLE! ENJOY PERSONALIZED COMFORT FOR YOUR SLEEP STYLE!】 You tried numerous types of pillows to find the right height. You always need to get a new pillow while your sleep needs happen to change. Stop! You can control your pillow height now! Osteo uses two different thicknesses for a custom feel. Simply rotate your bed pillow 180 degrees to enjoy a higher or lower contour! The removable insert at the bottom also provides more height liberty. Make your pillow just right for every night!

【HASSLE FREE AFTER-SALE SUPPORT - NO NEED TO RETURN!】 You spend about one-third of your life sleeping, why not choose a pillow best for your sleep and health? It's expensive to do cervical rehabilitation by a physical therapist every day, but it's easy to enjoy pain-relief sleep every night with Osteo contour pillow! We promise our quality products and customer service. If you do not enjoy the product, just contact our customer service, no questions asked, you will get the solution at once!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pillow is a game changer, 100% worth it money for a great night's sleep.
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has helped me get amazing sleep quality and my neck and back issues are gone after using this pillow for a few weeks. As a side sleeper it is comfortable and helps me keep my back and neck aligned. The quality of the pillow is top notch and I even ordered another one for my wife. If you are on the fence, get this pillow today, 5 star product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh my goodness!!!
reviews.reviewText: I planned to wait a week until I wrote a review on this pillow. Wanted to give it some time and see if I liked it. Well, I didn’t make it a week. I’ve been using it for 4 night so far and I have to say this is the best pillow I have ever used and I’ve tried a lot of them.I have had back pain for 20+ years upon waking in the mornings. Yesterday when I was at work I thought to myself, did my back hurt this morning when I got up? I didn’t remember wincing in pain when I was getting dressed. This morning when I woke up after a great long night of sleep I made a point of seeing how my back felt as I swung out of bed. Nothing. No twinge, no stiffness, nothing. I couldn’t believe it! I’m a back and side sleeper, mostly back and that is what made my lower back hurt when I woke up. I used to roll to my side and curl up to stretch out my back before I got out of bed to make it easier to move when I got up. This morning I was on my back when I woke up and as I said, no pain, no stiffness. I didn’t believe the people that said that in reviews before but I do now!!! I will recommend this pillow to anyone who says they have back pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly comfortable, takes forever to get rid of smell
reviews.reviewText: I went back and forth on leaving a 3 star review. The pillow itself is fantastic. Most comfortable pillow I've ever used. Really helped some neck pain I had from my former pillow. The reason for wanting to leave a low review is the smell. I'm aware that memory foam typically smells bad at first, not my first rodeo with this stuff. When you open the box it states in the literature that it has no smell. Don't put that when it's not true. Been a a week and a half and I still smell it. Want a good pillow? Buy this one and let it air out a few weeks first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet Dreams with the Osteo Pillow – Unparalleled Comfort!
reviews.reviewText: The Osteo Pillow has transformed my sleep experience, providing unparalleled comfort and support. Its innovative design perfectly cradles my head and neck, alleviating pressure points and ensuring a restful night's sleep. The quality materials and attention to detail make the Osteo Pillow a must-have for anyone seeking a blissful and rejuvenating sleep. Say goodbye to restless nights – the Osteo Pillow is a game-changer for a truly indulgent sleep experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and my shoulder/ neck pain went away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been struggling with my sleep quality recently so I figured it's time to change it up with a new pillow. I was hesitant at first with this pillow since it's an odd shape but I had nothing to worry about as the shape contours the back of the head putting the spine in a better position while sleeping. After a couple of nights of sleep, I felt my quilty of life improve and I recommend cervical pillows to anyone who has poor sleep as it may help them tremendously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's not a miracle for my neck, but it has helped. I have some neck pain and on traditional pillows I wake up during the night or in the morning feeling stiffness in my neck. I have not experienced that with sleeping on this pillow. It has not eliminated all neck pain, but has helped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars PIcky husband. Had same pillow for ever. He used this and not gone back
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable. Does not cover all side sleeping angles but the husband says his shoulders hurt less in the morning now. Finally replaced his very old pillow with one he likes
